General.Name: MQ Technology Bhd
General.Description: MQ Technology Berhad, an investment holding company, through its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells molds, tools, dies, jigs, and fixtures primarily for use in the production of hard disk drives in Malaysia, Thailand, Singapore, the United States. It also designs, develops, and manufactures advanced suspension tooling, progressive tooling, and semiconductor cavity/encapsulation molds for application in the hard disk drives and semiconductor industries; and advanced automation modules/assemblies for digital data storage, medical instrument systems/devices, and optoelectronics applications and related components. In addition, the company offers car spare parts; plastic, metal, and blowing molds for plastic products; and tooling products, jigs, and fixtures for use in electronic and semiconductor industries. Further, it is involved in property and project development related activities. The company was incorporated in 2003 and is headquartered in Petaling Jaya, Malaysia.
